description:
Grid Data Models (GDM) is a collection of pydantic data models for power distribution and transmission system components. These data models can be easily serialized and deserialized. GDM provides a standard interface for accessing power system component data with built in validation.

See also: https://pypi.org/project/grid-data-models/
name: GDM (Grid Data Models) [SWR-24-31]
